job description:
ALL CANDIDATES MUST HAVE AN ACTIVE TS/SCI WITH A POLYGRAPH CLEARANCE!

Requirements:
  • Work with a standing Dev Operations team to maintain hardware and corporate infrastructures utilizing configuration management systems.
  • The candidate shall be familiar with developing and configuring systems and server to provide reliable tools for analysts
  • Provide operational maintenance for each tool/system utilizing scripting/coding language such as Ruby, Shell, Python, configuration management systems (Puppet or Chef), and monitoring/logging solutions for operations (Nagios, CollectId, logStash, Kafka, or Cassandra)
  • Extensive SPLUNK experience utilizing the dashboard for installing, configuring and maintaining data ingest
  • Strong Linux Systems Administration skills, including configuration, troubleshooting, and automation
  • Experience with agency tools such as CASPORT, XACTA, CDW
  • Experience with:
    • TS/IP, DNS, HTTP specification (methods, headers, response codes) REST/Web architecture, MongoDB, Berkley DB, and scale out configuring Java application servers (Tomcat, Netty), configuring WWW servers (apache, nginx, haproxy), UNIX system administration, and distributed source code control (Git, mercurial) to ensure operation anal stability, reliability, and performance.
  • Minimal On-Call services are required
